item.title: Weekly picks
item.description: These are my picks of the 3d printing world for this week: all3dp.com on the best 33 online services for 3d printing (YouTube)3D Printing Nerd reviews the Kodama Obsidian (YouTube) Thomas Sanladerer on Filaween 2.0! Marty the robot is nearing it’s shipping date (YouTube)Maker’s Muse on recreating in game objects Hollow Draudi freatured on Thingiverse all3dp.com on the best sources for STL filess Baby Groot on cults3d.com
